article: sim bhullar and the sacramento kings are about to make nba history .
the kings are signing bhullar to a 10-day contract that will make him the league 's first player of indian descent , a person with knowledge of the deal said on wednesday .

the person spoke to the associated press on condition of anonymity because the kings are not expected to announce bhullar 's deal until thursday , when david wear 's 10-day contract expires and a roster spot opens up .
sim bhullar is set to become the nba 's first player of indian descent with the sacramento kings .
the 7-foot-5 , 360-pound bhullar is being called up from the team 's nba development league affiliate , the reno bighorns .
the 22-year-old centre will be on the roster on friday when the kings host the new orleans pelicans .
